@risika413

Munch and stranger were badly optimised ports thrown across for the holiday season,
Yes im aware that this has been ripped into an AIO package but alas skidrow do post updates for games E.G. COD/Fallout etc

The only public fix that was available was via a res changing config,
Not that much help to be honest even for some power users out there like myself with crossfire/i7 setups,

im well aware that they DO NOT have to post every single update available but when it effects performance across a variety of machines it would be nice of them to do so,

As a note to anybody else the dev team acknowledged the issues and did get a patch out within the last 2 days,

Whether this will make it to us pirates is unknown,
I'll await anybody to rip that across or created a patched executable

@ Isaac401

well... i started with mounting the image and installing it using DAEMON Tools Lite (4.30.3), after that i went in to the donloaded folder and extracted the SKIDROW folder from the image, and copy/pasted it into [C:\Program Files\Oddworld Inhabitants\Oddworld The Oddboxx].

I had short cuts from the installation on my deskop, so i dubble klicked on (Oddworld - Strangers Wrath) and a window popped up 
http://img404.imageshack.us/i/swrathlauncher.jpg/

I pressed Medium and then Play.

Then I press New Game

Then it says Enter Player Name, and its already typed in STRANGER so i press DONE, and the game starts with a intro movie, so i watch the whole movie. 
When the movie ends a window popps upp (in the game not in windows...) and says: 
UABLE TO SAVE GAME. PRESS SPACE Key TO CONTINUE.

I press Enter and the press RESUME GAME... and then i try to QUICKSAVE the window popps up again! :S :(

PS. I didint un pack the release, i just mounted it, (I mounted the DVD and installed) could that be the problem?

If so, what image sould i mount? cuz I can't find any images when i have unpacked it with WinRAR...
